name: bitloops-gherkin
description: bitloops-gherkin is a node.js package that allows you to generate Gherkin tables in Cucumber feature files using Google Sheets

scripts.generate-dts: rimraf src/grammar/Bitloops*.ts && node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc src/grammar/Bitloops*js --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --allowJs --outDir src/grammar && node_modules/prettier/bin-prettier.js --config .prettierrc --write src/grammar/*.d.ts
scripts.ant: java -jar /usr/local/lib/antlr-4.10.1-complete.jar -Dlanguage=JavaScript src/grammar/BitloopsLexer.g4 && java -jar /usr/local/lib/antlr-4.10.1-complete.jar -Dlanguage=JavaScript src/grammar/BitloopsParser.g4 && yarn generate-dts
scripts.ant:setup: java -jar /usr/local/lib/antlr-4.10.1-complete.jar -Dlanguage=JavaScript src/grammar/BitloopsSetupLexer.g4 && java -jar /usr/local/lib/antlr-4.10.1-complete.jar -Dlanguage=JavaScript src/grammar/BitloopsSetupParser.g4 && yarn generate-dts
scripts.copy-files: copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.html src/**/*.css src/scripts/workflows/*.json src/scripts/docker/* lib
scripts.build: yarn clean && tsc -p . && yarn copy-files && chmod +x lib/src/index.js

author: Bitloops S.A.
